channel.title: manjaro on 111qqz的小窝
channel.description: Recent content in manjaro on 111qqz的小窝

item.title: manjaro installation guide
item.description: 20180214 update: 第一个版本已经比较久了，于是更新一下，顺便写了个脚本orz pacman-mirrors -c China echo " [archlinuxcn] " >> /etc/pacman.conf echo " SigLevel = Optional TrustedOnly " >> /etc/pacman.conf echo " Server = https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/\$arch" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "[arch4edu]" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "SigLevel = Never" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "Server = http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/arch4edu/\$arch
